Headline: #67 67th-69th-71st Temporary Reroute at 67th/Saint Lawrence
ShortDescription: Revised: 67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted via 67th, Keefe, 68th, Cottage Grove and 67th, due to street blockage near 67th/Saint Lawrence.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Revised: #67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 67th, Keefe, 68th, Cottage Grove, then resume their normal route on 67th, due to street blockage near 67th/Saint Lawrence.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Pink & Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: Pink & Green Line trains running w/residual delays following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at Ashland. Service resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Pink & Green Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at Ashland.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Service Between 54th/Cermak and Polk, then Racine (Blue Line) Stations, Only
ShortDescription: Pink Line trains operate from 54th to Polk only, then connect w/Blue Line at Racine for continuing service due to unauthorized person on the tracks at Ashland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Pink Line service has been temporarily suspended between Polk and the Loop due an unauthorized person on the tracks at Ashland.

As a result, Pink Line trains are running as follows:

  • Between 54th/Cermak and Polk, and then are diverted to Racine on the Blue Line for direct connections at Racine to continuing Blue Line train service to/from downtown.

Using connecting Blue Line service:

  • For service to downtown from Pink Line stations between 54th/Cermak and Polk, take a Pink Line train toward the Loop and stay on board until the train reaches Racine on the Blue Line. Transfer to an O'Hare-bound Blue Line train from the same platform for service into downtown.

  • For service from downtown to Pink Line stations between Polk and 54th/Cermak, take a Blue Line train toward Forest Park to Racine. Stay on the same platform side and wait for a 54th/Cermak-bound Pink Line train.

Other possible alternatives may include:

  • #9 Ashland
  • #21 Cermak
  • #49 Western
  • #50 Damen
  • #52 Kedzie/California
  • #53 Pulaski
  • #54 Cicero
  • #60 Blue Island-26th
  • #82 Kimball-Homan
  • #94 South California
  • #157 Streeterville-Taylor buses

...including to/from and in combination with other 'L' services.

Note that if you take a bus to/from the Pink Line, you may also be able to connect to/from the Blue Line's Forest Park branch or Green Line along Lake Street directly via that bus route.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
